short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds option to hide filled crossword clues in https://www.nytimes.com/crosswords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A light extension that hides filled crossword clues in NYT Crosswords.

Adds an extra button to the NYT crossword toolbar to allow you to toggle hiding completed clues.

Highlighted clues will still show in the crossword, and you're able to unhide the clues at any time via the new toolbar button.
